data.summary: Inventory p95 latency spiked sharply while traffic stayed stable, suggesting backend contention rather than load. Most likely causes are DB lock contention or a slow query regression. Check DB locks, slow query logs, and recent deploys to inventory-service.
data.root_cause_hypothesis: DB lock contention or slow query regression in inventory-service
data.next_steps: 1) Check active DB locks and long-running queries. 2) Compare p95 latency by endpoint_group. 3) Review last deployment and feature flags. 4) Mitigate by scaling read replicas or rolling back if needed.
